data.feedback: Plan comprehensively covers all 9 user-requested epics with proper Clean Architecture structure, correct backend API alignment, and appropriate Flutter packages. All files marked for modification exist. Dependencies are properly ordered. Minor cosmetic issues (duplicate dependencies) don't affect execution.
issues: Minor: Duplicate epic IDs in some dependency arrays (cosmetic)
Minor: Backend lacks dedicated forgot-password endpoint - auth-ui story may need adaptation
suggestions: Remove duplicate entries from dependency arrays for cleaner JSON
Consider adding profile/settings feature for user account management
Add offline-first strategy documentation for step data caching
